Title: Rangi Taranga
Overview: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

Title: Ranna
Overview: Bhargava, the heir apparent of a wealthy family in Switzerland, is on a mission to reunite his aunt and grandfather. Of course, this isn't easy since his aunt holds a lot of grudges and isn't willing to pardon him right away.

Title: Vajrakaya
Overview: Vajrakaya is a Kannada film directed by Harsha A and produced by C. R. Manohar and C R Gopi. The film stars  and Shivaraj Kumar in lead roles. Music was composed by Arjun Janya.

Title: Aatagara
Overview: Ten contestants of a reality show, who come from different backgrounds, are taken to a secluded island. When some of them get killed one after another, it is up to the rest to investigate the matter.

Title: Kendasampige
Overview: When a love story goes awry, two young lovers are forced to take to the road with the police hot on their heels. They escape across Karnataka in a roller-coaster ride that is at once enthralling, exasperating and nail-biting.

Title: Mr. Airavata
Overview: A common farmer turns into an IAS police officer to help the poor and fight against corruption and finally taking the revenge of his murdered sister.
